name: Guidelicious
description:
Guidelicious is a short, interactive visual novel about waking up in a strange room with a mysterious man.

Engage in a fully voice acted story as every powerless move forward leads you closer to the truth of why you're here... hopefully.



<1,000 words (10-15 minutes of playtime)!
Fully voiced!
1 animated Guide + 1 interactive background!
5 endings!
Nameable protagonist!
9 Steam achievements!

This game was made for the O2A2 VN Jam 2023, a micro Visual Novel jam with strict asset limitations and a 1000 word limit.
